item.title: How AMD’s AI Software Helped It Score The Multi-Billion Dollar OpenAI Deal
item.description: Chips aren’t the only star of the massive agreement. AMD’s software efforts have slowly turned it into a more formidable competitor to Nvidia.

item.title: Windows Warning: Your Wallpaper Could Let Hackers Control Your PC
item.description: Oxford University researchers warn hidden code on your Windows desktop could leave you open to attack. Here's what you do.

item.title: New Space Observatory Reveals Extreme Physics Behind X-Ray Binary Stars
item.description: A new Japanese-led space observatory reveals unexpected thick winds around an x-ray binary star system halfway across the Milky Way.
